text: Elmar Fischer (6 October 1936 â€“ 19 January 2022) was an Austrian Roman Catholic prelate. Fischer was born in Innsbruck, Austria. He became a priest in 1961. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Diocese of Feldkirch from 2005 until his retirement in 2011.Catholic Hierarchy.org.-Bishop Elmar Fischer Fischer died from COVID-19 on 19 January 2022 in Innsbruck, at the age of 85.Today.i-n 24 Vorarlberg=Feldkirch Bishop Fischer Emeritus Dies of Corona ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Austrian Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from Innsbruck Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Austria
title: Elmar Fischer
